evidence.text: 6 | 2025-04-17 | MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION FINANCE AND POLICY, INC., INSTITUTE FOR HIGHER EDUCATION POLICY.

extracted.value: Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by Association for Education Finance and Policy, Inc. and Institute for Higher Education Policy on April 17, 2025, seeking a preliminary injunction to restrain and enjoin the Department of Education from terminating the Institute of Education Sciences' research activities.

evidence.text: 5 | 2025-04-09 | STANDING ORDER Establishing Procedures for Cases Before Judge Trevor N. McFadden.

extracted.value: Standing Order established by Judge Trevor N. McFadden on April 9, 2025, setting procedures for cases before the judge.

evidence.text: 16 | 2025-04-30 | Memorandum in opposition to re 6 MOTION for Preliminary Injunction filed by LINDA MCMAHON, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION.

extracted.value: Memorandum in Opposition filed by Linda McMahon on April 30, 2025, opposing the plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction.

evidence.text: 24 | 2025-06-02 | Consent MOTION for Extension of Time to File Answer re 1 Complaint, or Otherwise Respond to Complaint by LINDA MCMAHON, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION.

extracted.value: Consent Motion for Extension of Time to File Answer filed by Linda McMahon on June 2, 2025, requesting more time to file an answer to the complaint.

evidence.text: 29 | 2025-07-02 | MOTION to Dismiss, MOTION for Relief from Local Civil Rule 7(n)(1)'s Requirements by LINDA MCMAHON, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION.

extracted.value: Motion to Dismiss filed by Linda McMahon on July 2, 2025, seeking dismissal of the complaint under Local Civil Rule 7(n)(1).

evidence.text: 30 | 2025-07-07 | Consent MOTION for Extension of Time to File Response/Reply as to 29 MOTION to Dismiss by ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION FINANCE AND POLICY, INC., INSTITUTE FOR HIGHER EDUCATION POLICY.

extracted.value: Consent Motion for Extension of Time to File Response/Reply as to 29 Motion to Dismiss filed by the plaintiffs on July 7, 2025, requesting more time to file a response to the defendants' Motion to Dismiss.

evidence.text: 31 | 2025-07-14 | Consent MOTION for Briefing Schedule by ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION FINANCE AND POLICY, INC., INSTITUTE FOR HIGHER EDUCATION POLICY.

extracted.value: Consent Motion for Briefing Schedule filed by the plaintiffs on July 14, 2025, requesting a briefing schedule for the case.

evidence.text: 17 | 2025-05-06 | REPLY to opposition to motion re 6 Motion for Preliminary Injunction, filed by ASSOCIATION FOR EDUCATION FINANCE AND POLICY, INC., INSTITUTE FOR HIGHER EDUCATION POLICY.

extracted.value: Reply to Opposition filed by the plaintiffs on May 6, 2025, addressing the defendants' Memorandum in Opposition to the Motion for Preliminary Injunction.
